short_summary: Catering service required for RCMP-SE district in British Columbia, Canada
description: Catering service and food supplies needed for events organized by the RCMP-SE district in British Columbia, Canada. Throughout the year, various events are held, such as training activities, meetings, conferences, etc. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing catering services based on the demand presented by the customer on an as and when requested basis. Details on events will be provided by the RCMP-SE district in their monthly calendar.
full_summary:
### Call for Catering Services for RCMP South East District

#### Notice ID: 202303429/A

Opening Date: Tuesday, March 14, 2023
Closing Date and Time: Wednesday, April 12, 2023, 17:00:00 (Pacific Standard Time)

### Description
The RCMP South East District of British Columbia is seeking catering services on an “as and when requested” basis. This contract calls for one year from the contract award date, with an irrevocable option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods. The anticipated start date is May 2023.

### Tender Criteria
Bidders must provide the lowest priced compliant proposal.

### Tender Submission
Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at:

RCMP “E” DIVISION BID RECEIVING FRONT DESK
14200 Green Timbers Way
Surrey, BC V3T 6P3
Solicitation: 202303429/A

Submissions must also be made through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

### Important Information
*Canada is not responsible for the accuracy of the information found on websites of third parties.*
Canada retains the right to negotiate any proposal.
The RCMP has implemented the Integrity Regime protocol administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
*The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource that lists Indigenous-owned businesses and can provide opportunities for procurement.*

### Key Documents
The following documents include tender information:
*English RFP: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/10/316bf8e00bc8df0b6909e3713c474737/en_rfp_catering_service_for_rcmp-south_east_district_of_bc.pdf>
*French RFP: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/10/18b97a1acd19a84df362b4f016093c20/fr_rfp_catering_service_for_rcmp-south_east_district_of_bc.pdf>

Please do not hesitate to contact Gursharn Dhadwal (gursharn.dhadwal@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) with questions regarding this tender._deadline end date_161
